summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with Metrocenter YMCA to develop four projects to increase Seattle's ties with people from Pacific nations and to establish an ongoing process for supporting international projects with Pacific Rim nations on condition that Metrocenter YMCA seek additional funding from other sources; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1987 Budget of the Department of Finance General by the appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
